text: geugeosdeulboda hwilssin joh-eun bog-eum-eul naega geudaeege julini illeoga lodoe geugeos-eun hananim-eul gong-gyeonghaneun salam-eul wihan cheongug-imyeo geu mit-eneun gang-i heuleugo tieobsneun baeujawa deo bul-eo hananim-ui gippeum-eulo geugos-eseoyeongsaenghalila hananim-eun geubun-ui jongbogdeul-eul jikyeobogo gyesinila
